    • Method Detail

      • slot

        public Slot slot()
        Getter for the slot associated with this turn
        Returns:
        Slot which is using this turn

      • target

        public Slot target()
        Getter for the target Slot of this turn
        Returns:
        Slot targeted by this Turn

      • execute

        public void execute()
        Executes this turn. If changeToSwap was called, this turn will produce a swap between the leader and the first available awake pokemon. Otherwise, subclass implementation will be called.

      • forceSwap

        public void forceSwap()
        Forces this turn to do a swap on execute, instead of it's original intention.

      • addMessage

        public void addMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Adds a message to the summary of what happened in this turn
        Parameters:
        message - Message to add

      • getMessages

        public java.lang.String[] getMessages()
        Reports all relavent messages produced by executing this turn
        Returns:
        Messages to alert players of

      • doExecute

        protected abstract void doExecute()
        Hook method provided for subclass implementation.

      • reAdd

        public abstract boolean reAdd()
        Hook method provided for subclass implementation.
        Returns:
        True if this Turn should be added to the queue for next Round after it has been executed
